characteristic.__text: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **^^Kharadron Overlords Infantry^^** units while they are wholly within 6" of a friendly **Arkanaut Ironclad** or **Arkanaut Frigate**.
Once Per Battle, Deployment Phase

Pick a friendly **^^Skyvessel^^** that is part of a regiment from which no units have been deployed, then pick a number of units up to its Transport Capacity (see its warscroll) that are in its regiment.
Set up all of those units in reserve **in the clouds**. They have now been deployed.
**^^Deploy^^**
Your Movement Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Skyvessel^^** **in the clouds** to use this ability.

Set up that **^^Skyvessel^^** anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, set up all other units that were set up **in the clouds** with that **^^Skyvessel^^** wholly within 6" of it and more than 9" from all enemy units.
Reaction: You declared a non-**^^Charge Move^^** ability for a friendly **^^Skyvessel^^**
The **^^Skyvessel^^** using that **^^Move^^** ability

Pick a number of units up to that **^^Skyvessel^^**’s Transport Capacity (see its warscroll) that are wholly within 6" of it to be the targets. Units that have been transported this turn cannot be targets.
Remove the targets from the battlefield. After the **^^Skyvessel^^** ends its move, you must set up each target unit on the battlefield, wholly within 6" of that **^^Skyvessel^^** and not in combat. Those units have been transported. A unit cannot use **^^Charge^^** abilities if it was transported in the same turn.
Once Per Battle, Your Shooting Phase
Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
Ward rolls cannot be made for the target for the rest of the turn.
Once Per Battle, Reaction: Opponent declared a **^^Spell^^** ability for a **^^Wizard^^** within 30" of this unit
That spell is unbound.
Once Per Battle, Any Shooting or Combat Phase
Pick an enemy **^^Monster^^** within 12" of this unit to be the target.
Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.
Once Per Battle, Your Shooting Phase
Add 3" to the Range characteristic of ranged weapons used by friendly **Grundstok Thunderers** and **Grundstok Gunhaulers** units for the rest of the turn.
Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to each friendly **^^Skyvessel^^** in each phase.
Once Per Battle, Deployment Phase
Pick a friendly non-**^^Unique Kharadron Overlords Hero^^** that does not have an artefact of power.

Give that **^^Hero^^** 1 artefact of power from the ‘Inventions of the Sky-ports’.
**Designer’s Note:** *This artefact of power is given to the unit during the deployment phase, not during army composition.*
Add 2" to the Move characteristic of all friendly **^^Skyvessels^^**.
Add 2" to the Range characteristic of ranged weapons used by friendly **^^Kharadron Overlords Infantry^^** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
Deployment Phase
Pick an enemy unit to be the target.
Double the Damage characteristic of this unit’s weapons for attacks that target that enemy unit for the rest of the battle.
Each time a friendly **^^Skyvessel^^** wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Redeploy’ command, roll 2 dice and use the highest result when determining the distance that unit can move.
